project_abstract.cdata: The project consists of three components: (a) technical assistance for ELCOM's in-service training program; (b) expansion of ELCOM's distribution network; and (c) financing of the shortfall in foreign exchange due to currency exchange adjustments affecting the Ramu project financed by loan 737-PNG.
